title.rendered: Bespoke Design Stair Balustrade In Mayfair

content.rendered:
We created this bespoke exclusively designed staircase balustrade for a luxury townhouse in Mayfair. The design brief was to blend an exciting modern concept with traditional workmanship, and as a result we have created, fabricated and installed this design which we believe combines a sense of luxury and innovation but whilst still keeping with the historic nature of this Georgian property. We think that the use of the finest materials, and workmanship have provided an extremely impressive result.

Please see the working progress and the completed work.
